Lightning Talks

what Lightning Talks [presentation]
when March 21st, 2012
where TBD
who Dealer.com, Draker Labs, MicroStrain, Agilion Apps, PIEmatrix
Register Register for Event

Details

Please join us for a lightning talk round of presentations.

This will be an exciting event with multiple Vermont Software-as-a-Service related companies presenting back-to-back lightning talks about their Web App, technologies used, scaling, and biggest lessons.

Each company gets less than 10 minutes, followed by a group question & answer period when all presentations are completed.

Company presentations include:

  • Dealer.com
  • DrakerLabs.com
  • MicroStrain.com
  • AgilionApps.com
  • PIEmatrix.com

We will also be presenting the results of the latest BTVWAG survey. Please fill it out here and pass along to other Vermonters!

Hope to see you there!

See who's coming.

Register for Event

About BTVWAG

A place for technology enthusiasts focused on web development come together to share ideas. We meet once a month or two in Burlington to discuss a variety of web-related topics. See our past events for a list of previous topics.

Suggest a topic

  • December 7th, 2011 Software Craftsmanship from a Product Owner's Perspective
  • October 26th, 2011 BDD - Intro to automated testing for web developers
  • July 20th, 2011 Building CouchApps:CouchDB, JavaScript, and HTML5
  • Mar 30th, 2011 Round Table Discussion
  • Feb 22nd, 2011 Taming Your Process To Work For You
  • Jan 19th, 2011 Getting Started with CouchDB

BTVWAG is organized by Agilion Apps. Please contact us with any questions or comments.
